ygData.subject: RE: what should i be looking for now?
ygData.msgSnippet: When i killed him and got my demon claws, i was in a group ranging lvls 30-40. Avatar was blue to the lvl 40 and red to me,,,but we had a lvl 32, 35, 37,
ygData.messageBody:
When i killed him and got my demon claws, i was in a group ranging lvls
30-40. Avatar was blue to the lvl 40 and red to me,,,but we had a lvl 32,
35, 37, 38.....so we had a pretty acurate con of his level, he was always
blue to the lvl 40, me at 30 red, 35 red 37 yellow and 38 white or
black...depending up on how fast we conned him....
we killed him 16 times and he was always the same lvl,,,,but maybe he is
random...i cannot completely dismiss that....i have seen some creatures be
one lvl for 20+ kills then change...


>From: James Wofford <James.Wofford@...>
>Reply-To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
>To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
>Subject: RE: [warriors_eq] what should i be looking for now?
>Date: Thu, 15 Jul 1999 15:52:24 -0600
>
>From: James Wofford <James.Wofford@...>
>
>OK, I havent ever seen him cast spells the times that I was fighting him,
>we
>took him down pretty quick. Was a good group. But he was level 35 almost
>every time we killed him. He coned white to another lvl 35 warrior in my
>group. He did con yellow a few times to him as well. I think we got him
>about 5 or 6 times total. Also, is there a spell that is similiar to harm
>touch that has an a one time popper? Every time we would get him, he would
>immediately pop off this ability that would take the lvl 35 warrior to 2
>bubbles of health.
>
>I am not doubting you, but just stating what I have seen. I was also told
>he wasa a shadow night by others and just passing it along. If I am wrong,
>it is good to know so I dont pass along bunk info anymore.
>
>~Dyvim Kincaid
>Warrior of Cazic Thule
>
> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: Kevin Koen [mailto:big_k69@...]
> > Sent: Thursday, July 15, 1999 1:48 PM
> > To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> > Subject: RE: [warriors_eq] what should i be looking for now?
> >
> >
> > From: "Kevin Koen" <big_k69@...>
> >
> > ALSO the AVATAR of FEAR is not a shadowknight.... but he does has some
> > awesome dmg spells. and he will Fear u everychance he gets...,make sure
> > someone in your group has stun or a stun spell.
> >
> >
> > >From: James Wofford <James.Wofford@...>
> > >Reply-To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> > >To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> > >Subject: RE: [warriors_eq] what should i be looking for now?
> > >Date: Wed, 14 Jul 1999 11:04:16 -0600
> > >
> > >From: James Wofford <James.Wofford@...>
> > >
> > >I wouldnt start heading to Solusek A until around 25 and up. Maybe
>even
> > >higher. I didnt go anyway there until level 30. Solusek B is much more
> > >dangerous. I just set foot inside at level 30 and the first thing I
>saw
> > >was
> > >red. May have been bad luck to see a powerful Goblin right off
> > the bat, or
> > >maybe that is the way the whole place is. Do not know, I didnt go any
> > >farther.
> > >
> > >As for the demon claw. You should (I would think) depending on
> > the server
> > >your on, and how many high level characters are on the server be able
>to
> > >pick on up for around 200 - 300 plat. The shouldnt be for trade only
> > >items,
> > >and they can be obtained around level 32 on your own with a
> > group. Though
> > >you DEFINITELY better have 2 clerics and someone at least around
> > level 35.
> > >The mob is a level 35 SK and has a 800point harm touch from what I have
> > >heard. He never got me with the touch. He also smacks ya
> > around a little
> > >harder and alot faster than a Sand Giant.
> > >
> > >Dyvim Kincaid
> > >Warrior of Cazic Thule
> > >
> > > > -----Original Message-----
> > > > From: David Rogers [mailto:derogers334@...]
> > > > Sent: Wednesday, July 14, 1999 9:58 AM

> > > >
> > > >
> > > > From: David Rogers <derogers334@...>
> > > >
> > > > --- James Wofford <James.Wofford@...> wrote:
> > > > > As far as weapons are concerned. Try to get
> > > > > yourself a demons claw and tentacle whip.
> > > >
> > > > What are Demon Claws usually seen going for, or are
> > > > they also in the -trade only- area (which I hate)?
> > > >
> > > > > Another good money pit is solusek a.
> > > >
> > > > What levels can start working SolusekA, and when can
> > > > they reasonably expect to switch into SolusekB?
